page.title: 15Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: There is virtually no unemloyment in the block, most people work in Aberystwyth or the surrounding experimental agricultural establishments. There are many full time farmersbut there are also a proportion of part-time farmers who have full time jobs elsewhere, ranging from manual to professional work. The local schools & pubs provide some employment, mostly part-time. There are a few jobs in the gravel pits near Capel Bangor, although people from the block are not employed there. Transport in the area is minimal. There are privately run school buses from both communities to Aberystwyth schools. A bus services runs along the main road through Capel Seion on a Monday only. Llanfihangel has a public bus service twice a week. Car service for elderly/young mother is run.
